amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the term "emergency," the declaration of which would suspend the provisions of the bill, is intended to mean a situation that is immediately impending and extraordinary in nature, demanding attention due to a condition, circumstance, or practice reasonably expected to cause death, serious illness, or severe injury to humans, or substantial endangerment to private property or the environment if no action is taken.
